page.title: 09Chandag Summer Fair
page.content: {HERE IS AN ACCOUNT OF CHANDAG SUMMER {FAIR BY ANTHONY On Saturday we had a summer fair at school,it started at 1:45pm.There were different kinds of stalls in the small playground,and in the large playground country dancing and gymnastics took place.There was also a football game and a large trampoline.In our school hall there were stalls selling jumble. At 3:15pm about 40 people sang different kinds of songs.In the car park there was a fire engine which you could look inside of,and a few other new or old cars.Lots of people were making water bombs.This is where you have won a balloon,fill it up with water and throw it.There were also competitions for Air-Fix models and miniature gardens.The most expensive thing there was the bowls.This was 20p.
